name: Doctor Strange 2: The Return of Dr. Strange
overview: Doctor Strange 2: The Return of Dr. Strange is a PD Platform game, developed in AMOS Professional by The Ouija Board, which was released in Europe in 1995. A level editor is included on the disk. The sequel to a PD game I used to love in my youth. This one takes on a different format altogether - its predecessor had single-screen levels much like Qwak, although the sprites were smaller allowing for larger levels, and involved control of the titular character capturing creatures with the aid of a pickaxe. This one features larger scrolling levels and requires you to shoot creatures instead.
